snippet.title: Clever Idea #986
snippet.description:
Clever Idea #986
17 Jul 2011 by Molly Lee on Molly's LEEvings leevings.wordpress.com/2011/07/17/clever-idea-986/
To keep squirrels bunnies or raccoons from eating your plants, sprinkle your plants with cayenne pepper. The cayenne pepper doesn't hurt the plant and the squirrels won't come near it.
Topics: Clever Ideas
